ygData.subject: Re: Battle bard vs singing bard (was Does CHR affect Largos?)
ygData.msgSnippet: I actually haven t noticed this effect with my bard, though i could give it a try tonight (assuming I m not an idiot, err umm... well...) since I am less than
ygData.messageBody:
I actually haven't noticed this effect with my bard, though i could give
it a try tonight (assuming I'm not an idiot, err umm... well...) since I
am less than a bub from 19 (and my first ever trip to the little
continent).

>
> This is very easy for a bard to test. Accelerando uses a
> drum. Before you level and when your skill is maxed (and if
> you're under level 40), stop/start it a couple thousand
> times. Note your missed note rate. After you level, repeat
> but don't equip a drum (that will stop you from getting any
> skill increases). Compare.
>
--
We now return to the non-stop rock.

Matt DeBarger
